r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Redis
r.d: This extension provides an API for communicating with Redis servers.
r.n:
phpredis 3.1.5
This is interim release which contains only bug fixes.
* Fix segfault when extending Redis class in PHP 5 [d23eff] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Fix RedisCluster constructor with PHP 7 strict scalar type [5c21d7] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Allow to use empty string as persistant_id [344de5] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Fix cluster_init_seeds. [db1347] (@adlagares) * Fix z_seeds may be a reference [42581a] (@janic716) * PHP >=7.3 uses zend_string for php_url elements [b566fb] (@fmk)
